data.title: blas√©: Interpretable machine learning for high-resolution astronomical spectroscopy
data.name: blase
data.description: Interpretable Machine Learning for astronomical spectroscopy in PyTorch and JAX

evidence: "Interpretable Machine Learning for high-resolution astronomical spectroscopy." (domain-specific analysis tool)
"We can combine stellar, telluric, and instrumental models into a unified forward model of your entire high-bandwidth, high-resolution spectrum." (directly performs scientific modeling/analysis)
"Have a question or a research project in mind? Open an Issue or email gully." (points to a single user account as main contact; distribution via GitHub repo)
